sub.title: INTRODUCING
sub.sub:
CONTRALUZ IS A 100% ARTISANAL MEZCAL MADE FROM ESPADIN AGAVE.

IT IS THE PRODUCT OF A MATURATION AND SMALL-BATCH FILTRATION PROCESS
NEW TO THE WORLD OF MEZCAL.

note.title: A NOTE FROM MALUMA
note.sub:
RAISE A GLASS AND TOAST WITH ME...
HASTA VER LA LUZ!

MEZCAL KISS,

sub.title: OUR SPIRIT
sub.sub:
OUR CRISTALINO MEZCAL IS MATURED FOR APPROXIMATELY 6 MONTHS IN CHARRED AMERICAN OAK BARRELS AND FILTERED THROUGH ACTIVATED CHARCOAL.

THE RESULT IS A CRYSTAL-CLEAR LIQUID WITH AN ELEGANT BLEND OF AROMAS AND FLAVORS THAT ARE REFINED YET FULL OF MEZCAL'S SIGNATURE CHARACTER.
sub.titleTwo: Smooth and Elegant with the Complexity and Depth of

taste.title: TASTE & AROMA
taste.sub: PRIMARY NOTES OF GREEN AGAVE, CITRUS (ORANGE AND LEMON PEEL) FLORAL (BLOSSOM) AND A LIGHT SMOKE ARE COMPLEMENTED BY SUBTLE NOTES OF VANILLA, CEDAR, HONEY AND DRIED FRUIT. THE FINISH IS SWEET AND LONG LASTING, BALANCED BY THE TASTE OF COOKED AGAVE, CLOVE AND CACAO.

one.title:
1
-
HARVEST & COOKING
one.blurb: OUR CULTIVATED & FULLY MATURE ESPADIN AGAVES - HARVESTED BY REPUTABLE LOCAL PRODUCERS FROM THE TLACOLULA AND VALLES CENTRALES AREAS IN OAXACA - ARE COOKED IN UNDERGROUND STONE OVENS BEFORE THEY ARE GRINDED TO EXTRACT ITS SUGARS.

two.title:
2
-
FERMENTATION & DISTILLATION
two.blurb: DEPENDING ON THE TIME OF YEAR, WE FERMENT THE LIQUID FOR UP TO TEN DAYS BEFORE DISTILLING IT IN COPPER POT STILLS.

three.title:
3
-
MATURATION
three.blurb: OUR MEZCAL IS MATURED FOR APPROXIMATELY 6 MONTHS IN CHARRED AMERICAN OAK BARRELS, ALLOWING US TO STRIKE A BALANCE BETWEEN THE SUBTLE NOTES OF VANILLA, CEDAR, HONEY AND DRIED FRUIT FROM THE MATURATION, WITH THE LIGHT SMOKE DELIVERED FROM THE COOKED AGAVE.

four.title:
4
-
FILTRATION
four.blurb: OUR MATURED MEZCAL GETS FILTERED THROUGH ACTIVATED CHARCOAL TO EXTRACT THE COLOR AND ENHANCE FLAVORS - RESULTING IN AN ELEGANT BLEND OF AROMAS AND TASTES THAT ARE BOTH UNIQUELY DISTINCT YET CAPTURE MEZCAL'S SIGNATURE CHARACTER.

neat.title: STARLIGHT NEAT
neat.preparation: SERVED AT ROOM TEMPERATURE OR CHILLED. GARNISHED WITH A TROPICAL FRUIT SLICE SUCH AS STAR FRUIT.

spritz.title: CONTRALUZ SPRITZ
spritz.ingredients:
1 OZ CONTRALUZ CRISTALINO MEZCAL
1 OZ BERGAMOT LIQUEUR
4 OZ VEUVE CLICQUOT BRUT CHAMPAGNE
spritz.preparation: IN A FLUTE, MIX CONTRALUZ AND BERGAMOT LIQUEUR.  TOP IT OFF WITH CHAMPAGNE, GARNISH WITH A LEMON TWIST.

backlight.title: IN THE BACKLIGHT
backlight.ingredients:
1 OZ CONTRALUZ CRISTALINO MEZCAL
1 OZ FRENCH APERITIF
1 OZ COINTREAU
backlight.preparation: ADD TO A MIXING GLASS CONTRALUZ, FRENCH APERITIF, COINTREAU AND GRAPEFRUIT BITTERS, THEN STIR UNTIL MIXED. POUR INTO A FRESH ROCKS GLASS AND GARNISH WITH A LEMON WHEEL.

martini.title: ILLUMINATED MARTINI
martini.ingredients:
2 OZ CONTRALUZ CRISTALINO MEZCAL
1 OZ DRY VERMOUTH
1 BAR SPOON DOLIN BLANC VERMOUTH
martini.preparation: IN A MIXING GLASS, ADD CONTRALUZ, DRY VERMOUTH, A BAR SPOON OF DOLIN BLANC AND ICE. MIX AND STRAIN INTO A CHILLED MARTINI GLASS. EXPRESS LEMON OILS AND GARNISH WITH A LEMON PEEL.

tonika.title: MEZCAL CON TONIKA
tonika.ingredients:
2 OZ CONTRALUZ CRISTALINO MEZCAL
1 OZ GRAPEFRUIT JUICE
4 OZ TONIC WATER
tonika.preparation: IN A COLLINS GLASS, MIX CONTRALUZ AND GRAPEFRUIT JUICE, TOP IT OFF WITH TONIC WATER, GARNISH WITH A GRAPEFRUIT OR DEHYDRATED ORANGE SLICE.

live.sub:
"TO LIVE A LIFE IN CONTRALUZ IS TO EMBRACE THE SPONTANEOUS, GENUINE, AND UNEXPECTED MOMENTS IN OUR LIVES.

IT IS IN THOSE MOMENTS AWAY FROM THE SPOTLIGHT WHERE EXTRAORDINARY POSSIBILITIES LIE."

- MALUMA

raw.title:
DISCOVER THE EXTRAORDINARY
POSSIBILITIES OF A

moments.sub:
NEW TO THE WORLD OF MEZCAL, OUR CRISTALINO EMBODIES AN EXTRAORDINARY SPIRIT.

A SPIRIT THAT CELEBRATES THE RICH BEAUTY OF MOMENTS FOUND IN THE BACKLIGHT.

raise.sub: NEW TO THE WORLD OF MEZCAL, OUR CRISTALINO EMBODIES AN EXTRAORDINARY SPIRIT. A SPIRIT THAT CELEBRATES THE RICH BEAUTY OF MOMENTS FOUND IN THE BACKLIGHT.

toast.sub: TOAST TO THE FRIENDS WE MAKE AND FAMILY WE CREATE

raiseDos.sub:
SO RAISE A GLASS AND TOAST TO A LIFE IN CONTRALUZ - HASTA VER LA LUZ
(UNTIL YOU SEE THE LIGHT)!

buy.title: CONTRALUZ
buy.sub:
THE FIRST CRISTALINO MEZCAL REDEFINES WHAT ULTRA-PREMIUM MEZCAL LOOKS, FEELS, AND TASTES LIKE.

A PRODUCT OF A MATURATION AND SMALL-BATCH FILTRATION PROCESS NEW TO THE WORLD OF MEZCAL, CONTRALUZ CRISTALINO MEZCAL DELIVERS THE SMOOTH AND ELEGANT TASTING EXPERIENCE OF CRISTALINO WITH THE COMPLEXITY AND DEPTH OF MEZCAL. IT IS AN ELEGANT BLEND OF AROMAS AND TASTES THAT ARE DISTINCT YET CAPTURE MEZCAL'S SIGNATURE CHARACTER.

40% alc/vol.
